title: Kimberley Garner looks sensational as she turns out for the launch of YO! Kitchen in London
text:
She never fails to turn heads with her sensational sense of style.

And Kimberley Garner looked radiant as ever as she attended the opening of YO! Kitchen in Westfield London, White City on Thursday to celebrate the launch of YO!’s new dining concept and first full-service restaurant.

The former Made In Chelsea star, 28, donned a light pink blazer with a silk collar while she cinched her waist with a matching belt.

Event: Kimberley Garner, 28, looked radiant as ever as she attended the opening of YO! Kitchen in White City, London on Thursday

The TV star also wore a pair of blue skinny jeans while she added height to her frame with nude heels.

Kimberley looked in high spirits at the event where she joined fellow former Made In Chelsea star Ashley James and indulged in some of the refreshments on offer.

Ashley, 32, looked stylish in a silk, fuchsia robe-style mini-dress that came complete with a wrap around the waist with a tassel detail.

The reality star added height to her frame with a pair of black heels while she styled her blonde locks into an updo for the evening.

Style: The former Made In Chelsea star donned a light pink blazer with a silk collar while she cinched her waist with a matching belt

Daisy Lowe also turned out for the event where wore a black mini-dress with a lace covering and matching sleeves.

The model, 30, also wore black tights and completed her outfit with a pair of black boots.

Kimberley's outing comes after she appeared to confirm her reunion with her former boyfriend.

Pals: She was joined at the launch by fellow Made In Chelsea alumni Ashley James

Fun: The pair looked in high spirits as they caught up while sampling some of the refreshments on offer

Fashion: Ashley, 32, looked stylish in a silk, fuchsia robe-style mini-dress that came complete with a wrap around the waist with a tassel detail

Outfit: The reality star added height to her frame with a pair of black heels while she styled her blonde locks into an updo for the evening

Following their break-up last year, the blonde beauty told MailOnline: 'I ended the relationship recently. It was a really wonderful three years and we are still good friends today.'

The socialite has been notoriously tight-lipped about the identity of her former long-term boyfriend, who was often seen with the personality in West London.

But while the split was still raw, she admitted she was open to the prospect of dating new - as long as her suitor meets the right criteria.

Looking good: Daisy Lowe also turned out for the event where wore a black mini-dress with a lace covering and matching sleeves

Glamour: Daisy's stylish garment also featured a white, lace embroidered collar

Launch: The model also wore black tights and completed her outfit with a pair of black boots

Speaking to The Sun during her appearance at the 70th annual Cannes Film Festival, she said: 'It was a great relationship. I’d love to meet someone with a great personality — it’s all about the personality for me.'

Kimberely splits her time between London and Miami after purchasing a dream home in the coastal city.

Speaking to MailOnline about her new home, she explained: 'I worked very hard last year and had even moved home for a few months to save money.

'I really had my head down working to concentrate on goals, but achieved it on New Year’s Eve, praise God, and flew over here. Completing the sale on the plane over.'

Casual: Made In Chelsea's Louise Thompson sported an off-white turtle neck jumper with blue jeans and black and nude heels

Reflecting on her new home, the swimwear designer admitted it is a world away from the hustle and bustle of her busy life in London.

'It’s right on the beach, and really is a dream come true,' she explained. 'I am over doing the interior design, going for a beachy chilled vibe for the place.

'I won’t be moving there [permanently], as London is one hundred percent home, but really overjoyed and proud to have achieved it.'
description: The former Made In Chelsea star, 28, looked radiant as ever as she attended the opening of YO! Kitchen in White City, London on Thursday.
